line.text: Uh...I think this place is supposed to be under control by robots because of an uprising or something.
I'm sure this is a misunderstanding.
If you would like, I could help you regain control from the robots.
Well, I need an Exit Permit so I can go to Duck City and confront them.
I am capable of fabricating an Exit Permit for you; however, I require Scrap Metal.
Please acquire some Scrap Metal for me and then I shall create an Exit Permit.
